defaultIndex.description:
The initial index of the carousel when it is first rendered.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the carousel.

loop.description: Whether the carousel should loop around.

onIndexChange.description: Function called when the slide changes.

slidesPerView.description: The number of slides to show at a time.

spacing.description: The amount of space between slides.
